document_data.mainbody:
Abbey Fargo was a soldier in the Neverwinter Guard who served during the late 15 century DR.
She had a sister named Zoey, who was also a member of Neverwinters guard force.
Following the Siege of Neverwinter in the , Abbey was stationed with her sister in the citys Blacklake district.
Abbey was part of a force that stormed the Tower of Solace in order to rescue Dorothea Linkletter and stop the evil wizard Rhazzad. She fought alongside Zoey and their fellow guardsmen Sergeant Knox, Dell McCourt, Hawthidon Faalwun, and Dorotheas husband Josef.
